attributes.action: ease the financial burden on bereaved families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister

It is not being reported that at this time many bereaved families are being forced to sell their homes at rock-bottom prices in order to pay crippling death duties on overvalued family properties.

I am petitioning on behalf of all bereaved families for the Government to look at ways to ease the financial burden at a time of great emotional distress.
